1 #!/usr/bin/env python
2 
3 import sys
4 import rospy
5 from std_msgs.msg import Bool, Int16
6 
7 import rospkg
8 import os
9 import numpy as np
10 
11 
12 sys.path.append(rospkg.RosPack().get_path('ros_robotic_skin'))
13 
14 from scripts.controllers.PandaController import PandaController # noqa: E402
15 from scripts.controllers.SawyerController import SawyerController # noqa: E402
16 
17 
18 class ActivityMatrixController():
19  """
20  Activity matrix controller for the panda and sawyer robot arms
21  """
22  def __init__(self, controller, desired_positions_path, is_sim=True):
23  """
24  Panda Trajectory control class for sending
25  JointTrajectory messages to the real Franka Panda,
26  or the simulated Panda.
27 
28 
29  Parameters
30  --------------
31  `is_sim`: `bool`: If we are working with the real or simulated Panda
32 
33  """
34 
35  # get the controller, either sawyer or panda
36  self.controller = controller
37 
38  self.joint_dof_pub = rospy.Publisher('/joint_mvmt_dof', Int16, queue_size=1)
39  self.calibration_pub = rospy.Publisher('/calibration_complete', Bool, queue_size=1)
40  # rospy.init_node('calibration_joint_mvmt_node', anonymous=True)
41  self.pos_mat = np.loadtxt(desired_positions_path)
42  print(self.pos_mat)
43 
44  def spin(self):
45  """
46  Goes through all of the joints and positions.
47 
48  Arguments
49  ---------
50  None
51 
52  Returns
53  ----------
54  returns: None
55  """
56  joint_int = 0
57  self.controller.send_once()
58  while not rospy.is_shutdown():
59  # Increment the Dof we are actuating here
60  # Check if we have actuated every DoF, to end this script
61 
62  # go through every pose
63  print(joint_int)
64  if joint_int == 7:
65  self.calibration_pub.publish(True)
66  print('CALIBRATION COMPLETE')
67  break
68  # Publish this message so activation_matrix.py
69  # knows which Dof what actuated
70  self.joint_dof_pub.publish(joint_int)
71  rospy.sleep(1)
72 
73  # publish message to actuate the dof
74  self.controller.publish_positions(self.pos_mat[joint_int*2], 2)
75  rospy.sleep(5)
76  # publish -1 so nothing is put into activity matrix
77  self.joint_dof_pub.publish(-1)
78  # bring back to home position before next pose
79  self.controller.publish_positions(self.pos_mat[(joint_int*2)+1], 2)
80 
81  joint_int += 1
82 
83 
84 if __name__ == '__main__':
85  arg = sys.argv[1]
86  filename = sys.argv[2]
87  robot_type = sys.argv[3]
88  is_sim = True if arg == 'true' else False
89 
90  if robot_type == 'sawyer' and is_sim is False:
91  raise Exception('Real Sawyer support is currently not supported.')
92  # controller was determined from roslaunch file.
93  controller = PandaController(is_sim=is_sim) if robot_type == 'panda' else SawyerController()
94  rospack = rospkg.RosPack()
95  ros_robotic_skin_path = rospack.get_path('ros_robotic_skin')
96  desired_positions_path = os.path.join(ros_robotic_skin_path, 'config', filename)
97  try:
98  activity_matrix_control = ActivityMatrixController(controller, desired_positions_path, is_sim=is_sim)
99  activity_matrix_control.spin()
100 
101  except rospy.ROSInterruptException:
102  print('Exiting Franka Panda control process...')
